MessageHotelDisableHelp: You must enter the name/id of the person you want to disable renting hotels: <color=green>/hotel_disable "Player Name/Id"</color>
MessageHotelEnableHelp: You must enter the name/id of the person you want to enable renting hotels: <color=green>/hotel_enable "Player Name/Id"</color>
MessageAlreadyEditing: You are already editing a hotel. You must close or save it first.
MessageNoHotelHelp: You are not editing a hotel. Create a new one with <color=green>/hotel_new</color>, or edit an existing one with <color=green>/hotel_edit</color>
MessageHotelNewHelp: You must select a name for the new hotel: <color=green>/hotel_new "Hotel Name"</color>
MessageHotelEditHelp: You must select the name of the hotel you want to edit: <color=green>/hotel_edit "Hotel Name"</color>
MessageHotelEditEditing: You are editing the hotel named: <color=purple>{0}</color>. Now say <color=green>/hotel</color> to continue configuring your hotel. Note that no one can register/leave the hotel while you are editing it.
MessageErrorAlreadyExist: {0} is already the name of a hotel
MessageErrorNotAllowed: You are not allowed to use this command
MessageMaintenance: This Hotel is under maintenance by the admin, you may not open this door at the moment
MessageErrorUnavailableRoom: This room is unavailable, seems like it wasn't set correctly
MessageHotelNewCreated: You've created a new Hotel named: <color=purple>{0}</color>. Now say <color=green>/hotel</color> to continue configuring your hotel.
MessageErrorNotAllowedToEnter: You are not allowed to enter this room, it's already being used my someone else
MessageCouldNotFindToExtend: Could not find your room to extend, in the {0} hotel
MessageHotelExtendHelp: You must enter the name of the hotel you want to extend your stay at: <color=green>/hotel_extend "Hotel Name"</color>
MessageErrorAlreadyGotRoom: You already have a room in this hotel!
MessageErrorPermissionsNeeded: You must have the <color=purple>{0}</color> permission to rent a room here
MessageRentUnlimited: You now have access to this room for an unlimited time
MessageRentTimeLeft: You now have access to this room. You are allowed to keep this room for <color=purple>{0}</color>
MessagePayedRent: You payed for this room <color=purple>{0}</color> coins
MessageErrorNotEnoughCoins: This room costs <color=purple>{0}</color> coins. You only have <color=purple>{1}</color> coins
MessageErrorNotEnoughRP: This room costs <color=purple>{0}</color> RP. You only have<color=purple>{1}</color> Reward Points
MessageErrorNotEnoughItems: Not enough <color=purple>{0}</color>(s) for this room, you need <color=purple>{1}</color> more.
MessageMustLookAtDoor: You must look at the door of the room or put the roomId
GUIBoardAdmin:
<color=green>HOTEL MANAGER</color>

<color=cyan>Hotel Name:		{name}</color>
<color=grey>Hotel Location:</color>	{loc}
<color=orange>Hotel Radius:		{hrad}</color>	<color=yellow>Rooms Radius:	{rrad}</color>
<color=blue>Rooms:	{rnum}</color>		<color=red>Occupied:	{onum}</color>		<color=green>Vacant:	{fnum}</color>
<color=cyan>Rent Price:	{rp}	</color><color=purple>{rc}</color>
<color=grey>Duration:	{rd} Seconds</color>
<color=orange>Kick Hobos:	{kh}</color>		<color=yellow>NPC Id:	{npcId}</color>
<color=blue>Show Marker:	{sm}</color>
<color=red>Permission:	{p}</color>
GuiBoardBlackList:
<color=blue>You cannot enter {name} Hotel with any of the following items:</color>
<size=10>{blacklist}</size>
GUIBoardPlayerMaintenance:
<color=green>{name}</color>

Hotel is under maintenance. Please wait couple seconds/minutes until the admin is finished.
Menu2: <color=green>/hotel location</color> => sets the center hotel location where you stand
Menu3: <color=green>/hotel npc NpcId </color> => sets the NPC that is hooked to this hotel (for UseNPC items)
Menu4: <color=green>/hotel permission "Permission Name"</color> => sets the oxide permissions that the player needs to rent a room here
Menu5: <color=green>/hotel radius XX</color> => sets the radius of the hotel (the entire structure of the hotel needs to be covered by the zone)
Menu6: <color=green>/hotel rentduration XX</color> => Sets the duration of a default rent in this hotel. 0 is infinite.
Menu7: <color=green>/hotel rentcurrency XX</color> => (<color=orange>0</color> - Economics, <color=orange>1</color> - Server Rewards, "<color=orange>short name</color>" of item ie. scrap).
Menu8: <color=green>/hotel rentprice XX</color> => Sets the rental price of a room.
Menu9: <color=green>/hotel kickhobos [true/false]</color> => Toggles kicking sleepers without rooms.
Menu10: <color=green>/hotel showmarker [true/false]</color> => Toggles showing of map marker.
Menu11: <color=green>/hotel reset</color> => resets the hotel data (all players and rooms, but keeps the hotel)
Menu12: <color=green>/hotel roomradius XX</color> => sets the radius of the rooms
Menu13: <color=green>/hotel rooms</color> => refreshes the rooms (detects new rooms, deletes rooms if they don't exist anymore, if rooms are in use they won't get taken in count)
